conclusion: Understanding the flow of liquid through the baffles to determine which container each liquid will flow into.
Baffle A is pointing towards Container D.
Baffle B is pointing towards Container E.
Baffle C is pointing towards Container F.
Liquid from A will flow into Container D.
Liquid from B will flow into Container E.
Liquid from C will flow into Container F.
Final answer: Liquid from A will flow into Container D, liquid from B will flow into Container E, liquid from C will flow into Container F.
